description.value: When you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Change Shape], you can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Conceal an Object] inside a cavity in your body or Interact to grab an object stored inside your body. You can store up to four items of light Bulk or less if you are Large, three items of light Bulk or less if you are Medium, or two items of light Bulk or less if you are Small. If you Change Shape into a smaller-sized body, the excess items fall to the ground in your square. None of these items can have a dimension longer than 1 foot.
